comments:
Error Log view could show when Session starts (!SESSION) - that would help to divide distinct sessions, and specially find the errors at session end and session start - they are usually most probable causes of Eclipse shutdown.

If time permits, id like to contribute to this, by now I'll be happy to see your comments.
+1.  I often find myself wanting to tell users to tell me if they saw any errors in their last restart.

Created an attachment (id=79027)
sessions as top level elements in log view tree

I changed a bit LogViewContentProvider, rest of changes are most checks before casting to LogEntry and added handling of LogSession elements.
There was also bad date parsing format in LogSession.setDate(String).
I've checked all actions, mouse buttons and context menus actions to see if they still work.
Only some nice session icon  is missing now.
let's look at this in M3 when we move the log view into a new plug-in
